label: Disability
comment: A physical or mental condition that limits a guest's movements, senses, or activities.

datatypeProperties.comment: A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.
The date, time, date time, or other date time value when this guest disability has been registered.
A supporting device, expressed as text, for this required guest disability.
A restriction, expressed as text, for this disease protection means.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

referencedBy.comment: A disability notified for this guest person.
